CustomField.description: QR Code for Lab Request Form
CustomField.formula: Contact__r.Patient_ID__c & "%09" & Name & "%09" & Contact__r.LastName & "%09" & Contact__r.FirstName & "%09" & "%09" & "M" & "%09" & LPAD(TEXT(DAY(Contact__r.Date_of_Birth__c)),2,"0") & LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(Contact__r.Date_of_Birth__c)),2,"0") & TEXT(YEAR(Contact__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) & "%09" & "%09" & "OPTIMALE" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & "%09" & TEXT(Test_Type__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: QR Code for Lab Request Form
CustomField.label: QR Code - Form
